divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and myself were in our back yard looking at the low flying clouds thatwere lit by half moon. We both saw a blue orb in the night sky. After a minuteor so the glowing blue orb quickly hid behing one of the low flying clouds thencame out again quickly. After about five minutes of this the blue orb took offinto the clouds again and did not return.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Wellfleet
There were no other sightings in Wellfleet on or around September 8th 2002
Summary: Blue orb in the night sky
